009package Ch12_RansacAndHough;
010
011import static imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.addToDialog;
012import static imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.getFromDialog;
013
014import java.util.ArrayList;
015import java.util.List;
016
017import ij.IJ;
018//import ij.IJ;
019import ij.ImagePlus;
020import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
021import ij.gui.Overlay;
022import ij.plugin.ImagesToStack;
023import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
024import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
025import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
026import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
027import imagingbook.common.geometry.circle.GeometricCircle;
028import imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils;
029import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ColoredStroke;
030import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ShapeOverlayAdapter;
031import imagingbook.common.ransac.RansacResult;
032import imagingbook.common.ransac.RansacCircleDetector;
033
034/**
035 * RANSAC circle detection implemented with imagingbook library class
036 * {@link RansacCircleDetector}.
037 * 
038 * @author WB
039 *
040 */
041public class Ransac_Circles_Detect implements PlugInFilter, RansacDrawSettings {
042
043        private static RansacCircleDetector.Parameters params = new RansacCircleDetector.Parameters();
044        static {
045                params.randomSeed = 17;
046        }
047        
048        private static int MaxCircleCount = 3;
049        
050        private int W, H;
051        private ImagePlus im;
052        private String title;
053
054        @Override
055        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
056                this.im = im;
057                return DOES_8G + NO_CHANGES;
058        }
059
060        @Override
061        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
062                title = "Circles from " + im.getTitle();
063                W = ip.getWidth();
064                H = ip.getHeight();     
065                
066                if (!runDialog()) {
067                        return;
068                }
069        
070                Pnt2d[] points = IjUtils.collectNonzeroPoints(ip);
071                List<RansacResult<GeometricCircle>> circles = new ArrayList<>();
072
073                // ---------------------------------------------------------------------
074                RansacCircleDetector detector = new RansacCircleDetector(params);
075                // ---------------------------------------------------------------------
076                
077                List<ImagePlus> resultImages = new ArrayList<>();
078                int cnt = 0;
079
080                RansacResult<GeometricCircle> sol = detector.detectNext(points);
081                while (sol != null && cnt < MaxCircleCount) {
082                        circles.add(sol);
083                        cnt = cnt + 1;
084                        
085                        ImagePlus imSnap = new ImagePlus("circle-"+cnt, showPointSet(points));
086                        Overlay oly = new Overlay();
087                        ShapeOverlayAdapter ola = new ShapeOverlayAdapter(oly);
088                        imSnap.setOverlay(oly);
089                        
090                        {       // draw inliers (points)
091                                ColoredStroke stroke = new ColoredStroke(LineStrokeWidth, InlierColor, 0);
092                                stroke.setFillColor(InlierColor);
093                                for (Pnt2d p : sol.getInliers()) {
094                                        ola.addShape(p.getShape(InlierRadius), stroke);
095                                }
096                        }
097        
098                        {       // draw initial circle
099                                GeometricCircle circle = sol.getPrimitiveInit();
100                                ColoredStroke stroke = new ColoredStroke(LineStrokeWidth, InitialFitColor, 0);
101                                ola.addShape(circle.getShape(), stroke);
102                        }
103        
104                        {       // draw final circle
105                                GeometricCircle circle = sol.getPrimitiveFinal();
106                                ColoredStroke stroke = new ColoredStroke(LineStrokeWidth, FinalFitColor, 0);
107                                ola.addShape(circle.getShape(), stroke);
108                        }
109        
110                        {       // draw the 3 random points used
111                                ColoredStroke stroke = new ColoredStroke(LineStrokeWidth, RandomDrawDotColor, 0);
112                                stroke.setFillColor(RandomDrawDotColor);
113                                for (Pnt2d p : sol.getDraw()) {
114                                        ola.addShape(p.getShape(RandoDrawDotRadius), stroke);
115                                }
116                        }
117                        
118                        resultImages.add(imSnap);
119                        sol = detector.detectNext(points);
120                }
121
122                // combine all result images to a stack:
123                if (resultImages.isEmpty()) {
124                        IJ.error("No items detected!");
125                }
126                else {
127                        ImagePlus stack = ImagesToStack.run(resultImages.toArray(new ImagePlus[0]));
128                        stack.setTitle(title);
129                        stack.show();
130                }
131                
132                List.of(1,2,3,4);
133        }
134
135        // ------------------------------------------------------
136        
137        private ByteProcessor showPointSet(Pnt2d[] points) {
138                ByteProcessor bp = new ByteProcessor(W, H);
139                IjUtils.drawPoints(bp, points, 255);
140                bp.invertLut();
141                return bp;
142        }
143        
144        private boolean runDialog() {
145                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
146                addToDialog(params, gd);
147                gd.addNumericField("Max. number of circles", MaxCircleCount);
148                
149                gd.addStringField("Output title", title, 16);
150                
151                gd.showDialog();
152                if (gd.wasCanceled())
153                        return false;
154                
155                getFromDialog(params, gd);
156                MaxCircleCount = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
157                title = gd.getNextString();
158                
159                return params.validate();
160        }
161}
